page.title: 09PENICUIK HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: The building was started in{March 1984 and the main contractor was J H Russell.It is due to be opened at the beginning of{August 1985. At the main door is the{reception {desk}and{doctor's waiting areas.}There is a{separate waiting room for the {dentists' patients.}There are nine {doctor's surgeries,}each with an outside phone and an internal phone to the reception desk. The{three dentist {rooms}are supplied with gas, water and electricity. There are also{rooms for {health education, a chiropodist, an {exercise room for the physiotherapists {and an interview room. Upstairs there are{four offices, a {staffroom, a canteen, toilet and {storeroom.}For security, there are burglar and fire alarm systems.
